To the Admin of this website, don't take this video down. If people don't want to see it, it's their choice. For those that do, go for it. It's not that bad to watch. Correction. You don't actually see any decapitation take place, only the throat is seen cut open deeply and then, later, the head is seen totally decapitated afterwards. The same thing with the arm. One leg is completely cut off but you don't see him actually cutting it completely off. This delimbing must have taken some time to do. That's why all the video editing out of certain parts. The sodomy isn't real, from what I've seen. Magnotta still has his pants on so no pennetration is seen. He only does the motions to make it look like necrophelia is taking place. What really sucks is the American media is not covering this story except CNN. They'e doing, at least, some coverage of this online crime.

All of the stabbing and cutting that takes place are post mortum wounds that Magnotta inflicts on Jun Lin as he is already dead @ 1:12 into the film. So keep that in mind while watching this.

One last thing. Keep in mind that @ 1:12 into the film, Jun Lin is already dead from a mortally sliced-open neck wound with a knife. The rest of this is just gore on a dead body. It's not so bad if you compare it to 3 men 1 hammer as the victum lived through almost the whole 7 1/2 minute clip.

Note that this is really, really bad.  This is not "soft gore," this is much worse than I could imagine.  

Do not watch this video if you are having any instabilities recently.  I can honestly attest that even law enforcement types will find this hard to take in.
